# Prediction Matrix - AI Sports Betting Predictions
# https://www.predictionmatrix.com

## About
Prediction Matrix provides AI-powered sports betting predictions for NFL, NBA, NHL, and College Basketball.
Our model uses Elo ratings, team statistics, weather data, and injury reports to generate spread, moneyline, and over/under predictions.

## Content Overview
- Daily betting predictions with spread picks, moneyline odds, and totals
- Team power rankings based on Elo ratings
- Historical pick accuracy and ATS (against the spread) results
- Game-by-game prediction breakdowns with calculation transparency

## Key Pages
- / - Homepage with today's picks across all sports
- /dashboard - NFL betting dashboard
- /nba - NBA betting predictions
- /nhl - NHL betting predictions
- /cbb - College basketball predictions
- /rankings - NFL power rankings
- /nba/rankings - NBA power rankings
- /nhl/rankings - NHL power rankings
- /results - NFL historical results and accuracy
- /nba/results - NBA historical results
- /nhl/results - NHL historical results
- /about - Model methodology and transparency

## Data Freshness
- Predictions updated every 4 hours during active seasons
- Vegas odds locked 1 hour before game time
- Power rankings recalculated after each game

## AI Crawling Guidelines
User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /account

## Contact
Website: https://www.predictionmatrix.com
